mapper.select: SELECT EMP_NO, EMP_NAME, BIRTH, ENTER_DATE, EMAIL, RESIGN_DATE, MOBILE , ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, PASSWORD, DAY_OFF, PROFILE_PATH, USED_DAY_OFF , DEPT_NO, POS_NO, ROLE, POSTCODE FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND DEPT_NO != 4000

SELECT E.EMP_NO, E.EMP_NAME, E.DEPT_NO, E.POS_NO , D.DEPT_NAME AS DEPT_NAME, P.POS_NAME AS POS_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO JOIN POSITION P ON E.POS_NO = P.POS_NO WHERE E.EMP_NO = #{empNo}
SELECT DEPT_NO, DEPT_NAME FROM DEPARTMENT WHERE DEPT_NO != 4000 AND PARENT_ID = '9999'
SELECT DEPT_NO, DEPT_NAME FROM DEPARTMENT WHERE PARENT_ID LIKE '5%'
